shadow.comment: Demonstrates a turtle field with no validator.

Validates combinations of names and hats to null (invalid) if they could be considered infringe-y. This turns the turtle field red. Infringe-y combinations are: (Leonardo, Mask), (Yertle, Crown), and (Franklin, Propeller).
Validates the input so that certain names always have specific hats. The name-hat combinations are: (Leonardo, Mask), (Yertle, Crown), (Franklin, Propeller).
